hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cd "/tmp/$workingdir/kubeadm"
sleep 60s
echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "Configuring the Master Node"
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alihhussain/AzureTemplates/master/K8s/kubeadm/fabfileformaster.py
elbdns=$(sudo cat /tmp/$workingdir/Initial/elbip.txt) sed -i "s#{elbpublicdns}#$elbdns#g" fabfileformaster.py fab -f fabfileformaster.py -P deployall
